prompt: Dear all Ficsit Pioneers, R&D would like to remind you that the taming of wild flying beasts is against aviation protocol. R&D would like to advise you Ficsit health insurance does not cover injury caused from falling from giant sky beasts.
message: Dear all Ficsit Pioneers, R&D would like to remind you that the taming of wild flying beasts is against aviation protocol. R&D would like to advise you Ficsit health insurance does not cover injury caused from falling from giant sky beasts.
